alert.note: Alert for Emanuel; Johnson; Laurens; Treutlen; Washington (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 1:29PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Laurens, central Emanuel, northern Treutlen, south central Washington and Johnson Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 129 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms extended from near Donovan to near Swainsboro to Portal, and moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, nickel sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Swainsboro, Wrightsville, Twin City, Adrian, Stillmore, Oak Park, Nunez, Spann, Donovan, Covena, Tuckers Crossroad, Orianna, Norristown, Lovett, Norristown Junction, Meeks, Lexsy, Brewton, Blackville and Zaidee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central, southeastern and east central Georgia.
